Pathfinder Worker:
You may enter the following Rim Kamalokas. You will not be allowed to re-enter until you have recovered, no matter which one you enter. Keep that in mind!
(You can only enter Rim Kamaloka once per day, 1000 PC Cafe points will be consumed).
Enter Nightmare Hall (35 ~ 45 level)
Enter Nightmare Hall (40 ~ 50 level)
Enter Nightmare Hall (45 ~ 55 level)
Enter Nightmare Hall (50 ~ 60 level)
